metadata.title: ngAtlanta
metadata.desc: 2nd annual Angular conference in Atlanta, GA focused on diversity in technology.

metadata.title: Angular Academy
metadata.desc: Angular Academy is a 2-day intensive coding workshop for professional web developers in Canada! Learn Angular 7 and TypeScript Now in Montreal with this immersive instructor-led classroom training!

metadata.title: Angular Academy
metadata.desc: Angular Academy is a 2-day intensive coding workshop for professional web developers in Canada! Learn Angular 7 and TypeScript Now in Ottawa with this immersive instructor-led classroom training!

metadata.title: Angular Academy
metadata.desc: Angular Academy is a 2-day intensive coding workshop for professional web developers in Canada! Learn Angular 7 and TypeScript Now in Toronto with this immersive instructor-led classroom training!

metadata.title: Académie Angular
metadata.desc: Académie Angular est un Workshop intensif de 2 jours pour les développeurs web professionnels! Apprendre Angular 7 et TypeScript Maintenant à Québec avec cette formation immersive en classe avec instructeur!

metadata.title: Angular Academy
metadata.desc: Angular Academy is a 2-day intensive coding workshop for professional web developers in Canada! Learn Angular 7 and TypeScript Now in Vancouver with this immersive instructor-led classroom training!

metadata.title: Angular NL
metadata.desc: Angular rises again, for a long time Angular has disappeared from the Tech Community in the Netherlands. As one of the World's most hyped and used frameworks we are proud to announce that Angular will be back in Amsterdam on the 8th of March 2019.

metadata.title: The Big Hangout 2019
metadata.desc: Angular stories, emerging techniques and proven approaches for Angular developers. This is a half-day and evening event for Angular community in Finland and international guests.

metadata.title: ngConf
metadata.desc: The World's Original AngularJS Conference in Salt Lake City. Top JavaScript developers from Google and around the world.

metadata.title: ngVikings
metadata.desc: ngVikings is a non-profit, non-commercial, 100% community-driven event comprised of many Nordic Angular groups with more than 3500 active members in total. Always having Angular team members, Google Developer Experts and legendary international speakers onboard, ngVikings Conference guarantees an excellent program: fresh, technically deep and 100% useful.

metadata.title: Angular Day
metadata.desc: Angular Day is dedicated to developers and technical managers. Every year, you can learn about all the updates on Angular and the surrounding technologies, find new partners and get to know new employees.

metadata.title: ngSriLanka
metadata.desc: ngSriLanka 2019 is Sri Lanka's first ever Angular conference. It will be held in Colombo and organized by the enthusiastic, local Angular community with over 800 developers

metadata.title: ngDenver
metadata.desc: AngularDenver 2018 is Denver’s first all-day Angular conference! Angular developers from all across the country are coming to Denver, Colorado for a full day of keynote speakers and presentations on Friday, August 3rd. There will also be 2 days of pre-conference workshops, on Wednesday and Thursday, August 2nd and 3rd.

metadata.title: Angular Lunch STL
metadata.desc: We meet at lunch time to talk about all things Angular. Usually one Wednesday per month. Come join us for presentations and deep Angular discussion. Lunch will be provided.

metadata.title: NG-DE
metadata.desc: NG-DE is the first community-driven Angular conference in Germany. We will run the opening event in Berlin, 30 & 31 August 2019. The venue BOLLE FESTSÄLE is located next to the beautiful river Spree, close to Bellevue palace and Tiergarten. A bunch of one-day workshops are planned for August 29 which can be booked separately.

metadata.title: ngTalks
metadata.desc: Join us in a quest of developing a brighter Angular community, attend NgTalks, the first of many conference dedicated to latest and greatest news and insights from the global Angular network, covering best practices, approaches and cutting-edge trends.

metadata.title: ngSpain
metadata.desc: ngSpain is the only Angular Conference in Spain. 2019 will be it's first eddition and will be held in the capital, Madrid. It is an event run by the community from the community, with organisers from all over Europe belonging to the Angular community.

metadata.title: ngTaiwan
metadata.desc: Angular Taiwan is an Angular community in Taiwan. We are welcome anyone to join us, and feel free to post and share any articles, courses, videos or any discussion that related to Angular.
